titles.title: Kotoshi Ichinen no Furikaeri Dazo / Keitai Denwa de Battle Dazo / Lord of the Ikaring Dai Ichi Bu: Tabi no Nakama Dazo / Lord of the Ikaring Dai Ni Bu: Futatsu no Tou wa Shiranaizo / Lord of the Ikaring Dai San Bu: Kandou no Kanketsuhen Dazo
